means: 目的论，有目的，目的论者

word_mean: 目的论：最终目标论，即对某一明确目的的适应论
目的论认为生物和人类的活动受一定目的的引导
认为生物的适应是绝对完善的，生物体的结构与功能严格对应，生物体的结构是为一定的功能目的而设计的，各部分的结构又是按最合理的方式组合成整体的一种理论。

sentence.Network_en: By teleology it intended the purposefulness of nature.
sentence.Network_cn: 所谓目的论,就是指自然界本身具有目的性.

sentence.Network_en: Nowadays, there are three kinds of ethics: deontology, teleology and theory of enlightenment.
sentence.Network_cn: 目前伦理学有三大类型,即规范(义务)论 、 目的论、教化论.

sentence.Network_en: Even psychologists who applaud his teleology and antireductionist position may not be comfortable with him.
sentence.Network_cn: 即使赞成他目的论和反简化论点的心理学家也未必对他心服.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 11．目的论（teleology）（Teleology）——神创造世界的目的，救赎的目的，选立以色列的目的，呼召教会的目的，第一与第二次来临之目的等； …
哲学概论讲义 -... ... |           |-- Structure 结构 |           |-- Teleology 终极论 | |-- Causation 因果论.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent. (denoting the branch of philosophy that deals with ends or final causes): from modern Latin teleologia, from Greek telos 'end' + -logia (see -logy)

means.word_mean: 1. (philosophy) a doctrine explaining phenomena by their ends or purposes

auth_sentence.content: No goal-directedness or teleology in the mechanisms of natural selection.
auth_sentence.res_content: No goal-directedness or teleology in the mechanisms of natural selection.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: No goal-directedness or teleology in the mechanisms of natural selection.

auth_sentence.content: He never abandoned determinism for teleology.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He never abandoned determinism for teleology.

auth_sentence.content: To claim this mechanism is broken is to presume teleology and a measuring stick.
auth_sentence.res_content: To claim this mechanism is broken is to presume teleology and a measuring stick.
